definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cause to break or burst forth, break forth with (cf. Ar. fad.axa break, crush; Eth. fas’h’a: shatter; Syr ps.ah. is be joyous, hilarious);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[פָּֽחְחוּ רִנׇּה]] Is 14:7 they have broken forth with joyous shout; Impf. [[יִפְחְחוּ רִנׇּה]] Is 55:12 (of mts.); Imv. fs. [[פִּחְחִי רִנׇּה]] Is 54:1 (of Zion); mpl. ´[[פִּחְחוּ ר]] Is 44:23, Is 49:13 Qr (> Kt [[יפחחו]]; of mts.); abs. [[פִּחְחוּ]] Is 52:9, Ps 98:4 (both + [[רַנְּנוּ]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: break bones in pieces: Pf. 3 pl. [[פִּצֵָּחוּ]] Mic 3:3.
